entry.title: $2500 // HUGE TWO BEDROOM**HEART OF ASTORIA**SMALL PETS OK**OUTDOOR SPACE*
entry.content:
HUGE TWO BEDROOM**HEART OF ASTORIA**SMALL PETS OK**OUTDOOR SPACE*

Listing ID #: 169534
Price: $2,500
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0 (ground)
Bathrooms: 1.0
Floor: 1

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
High Ceilings
Light

This is a wonderful huge two bedroom apartment with oversize windows, four closets and outdoor space. The living room is very spacious and leads to an open concept kitchen with an island that you can use it as a breakfast bar. Also the kitchen features plenty of custom cabinets, granite counter top and is equipped with stainless steel appliances, a gas range, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher. Both bedroom will easily fit queen size bed and have their own closet and window. One of the bedroom has access to the backyard.

Located on 32nd street and 30th Avenue three minute from the subway N& W lines!!!!

Heat and hot water is included on the rent. Small pets allowed.

For private viewing contact the Astoria expert realtor, Olga Panteli sideratou :929-320-9228 or email at [email protected]

Olga Panteli
